titleInfo.title: Discovering the prehistory of multilingual situations in the lexicon. An empirical study on the Caucasian Urum vocabulary

bibliographicCitation.bio1:
Ries V, Skopeteas S, Turan E, Nahrmann K (2014)
Discovering the prehistory of multilingual situations in the lexicon. An empirical study on the Caucasian Urum vocabulary.
Linguistik Online 64(2): 7-28.
